dialogue.introduction: I've... come again, to these seas. Yuugumo-class destroyer, Hayashimo... reporting for duty.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the 17th of the Yuugumo-class Destroyer, Hayashimo. I was born in the Maizuru Naval Base Factory, to times of impending troubles. I launched for the Battle of Leyte Gulf from the Lingga Naval Anchorage... And I've seen many things.
dialogue.secretary2: Heh... Yeah. This scenery hasn't changed.
dialogue.secretary3: Commander? To care about me, you're really kind.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Just like this... I'm always watching. Watching... always... forever.
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander. I think you're working a bit too much too. Umm... Sometimes, together, we should... Uu... I-it's nothing... Uu
dialogue.wedding: Commander, meeting you, I... I'm glad. So, just this is enough... eh? This is... truly? I... can I change, I wonder?
dialogue.show_players_score: Commander, you'll look at the data? I see...
dialogue.equipment1: Stronger... Will something change if I get stronger?
dialogue.supply: Thank you very much. You have my gratitude.
dialogue.docking_complete: The repair... right... Repair is repair.
dialogue.ship_construction: More battle strength is needed... again... they increased.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet returned. Fu...Fufufu. They returned.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Victory strategy number one? Oh, it's not huh.
dialogue.battle_start: You want to go at it with me? Fine, I'll be your opponent.
dialogue.night_battle: Night, huh... Fufu, let's jump right in.
dialogue.mvp: You're giving someone like me your blessing? Commander, you're a good person. Fufu... Ufufu.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Ouch... what... this time it's my chimney?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Like this, it can't be helped. Isn't there a good sandbar around?
dialogue.sunk: Right in front of me... everyone is... what should I do. Wait... wait... I'm going too.

hourly.0200: 0200. We have an enjoyable time at night, too. I've watered it down (the sake), let's keep having fun!
hourly.0300: 0300. Pulling an all-nighter will harm your body, commander. Rest for awhile.
hourly.0400: 0400. The blue of the morning sky. I don't hate it, but it's a little cold right now.
hourly.0500: 0500. I'm sorry, was my hand cold to the touch?
hourly.0600: 0600. Let's wake everyone up and get ready for the day.
hourly.0700: 0700. The morning checks have been done... Let's look for Mamiya-san... And have our breakfast.
hourly.0800: 0800. Commander, here's the mission file for the day. Let's start by looking at it closely.
hourly.0900: 0900. All fleets that can be deployed have been sent out on expeditions. What should we do with the remaining ships?
hourly.1000: 1000. Ah... What is it, Shiranui-san? Did you need us for anything?
hourly.1100: 1100. Commander, I'll be making... Maizuru-styled meat stew for lunch, alright? Fufu...
hourly.1200: 1200. How was... the meat stew? There's enough... For seconds.
hourly.1300: 1300. Saying it was delicious... That's... Troubling for me...
hourly.1400: 1400. Commander, am I... Mistaken about anything? Oh, I see. It's fine then.
hourly.1500: 1500. It's time for... Some snacks. Caramel... I don't hate it.
hourly.1600: 1600. The caramel was delicious. Makigumo-nee-san... You ate too much.
hourly.1700: 1700. Commander, fighting a losing battle is detestable isn't it? No more...
hourly.1800: 1800. I'll make dinner. It's not something to be made light of... It's curry.
hourly.1900: 1900. I added some coconuts from the southern islands into my curry. Fufu...
hourly.2000: 2000. There's enough curry for every girl, so please help yourself to it.
hourly.2100: 2100. Commander, how was Hayashimo's curry? Fufu...Fufufufu...
hourly.2200: 2200. Ah, Nachi-san brought the whiskey bottle. Will you drink some?
hourly.2300: 2300. When I'm together with the Commander... I'll... Forget about all these unpleasant happening.
